item.title: Adobe announces End of Life for Business Catalyst
item.description: Today Adobe announced they would be ending the Business Catalyst platform on March 26, 2020. This is a HUGE blow to all BC partners and customers and we wish Adobe would reconsider this choice. We have built hundreds of sites on the BC platform and saw it's potential the moment we learned about it back in 2008. Here are some important milestones to pay attention to: 26TH MARCH 2018 Announcement of Business Catalyst End Of Life date for March 26th 2020 Trials can still be created from the Partner Portal or OBB, as long as they are upgraded by June 18th 2018 18TH JUNE 2018 No new trials can be created No new sites can be upgraded to paid Support is prioritized for platform migration questions, in addition to critical security, compliance, and availability issues All sites will move to monthly billing on their first renewal date after June 18th 2018 26TH MARCH 2020 All data is removed from the Business Catalyst infrastructure and sites become unavailable for the public Read More on BusinessCatalyst.com
item.content:encoded:
Today Adobe announced they would be ending the Business Catalyst platform on March 26, 2020. This is a HUGE blow to all BC partners and customers and we wish Adobe would reconsider this choice. We have built hundreds of sites on the BC platform and saw it's potential the moment we learned about it back in 2008.

Here are some important milestones to pay attention to:

26TH MARCH 2018

  • Announcement of Business Catalyst End Of Life date for March 26th 2020
  • Trials can still be created from the Partner Portal or OBB, as long as they are upgraded by June 18th 2018

18TH JUNE 2018

  • No new trials can be created
  • No new sites can be upgraded to paid
  • Support is prioritized for platform migration questions, in addition to critical security, compliance, and availability issues
  • All sites will move to monthly billing on their first renewal date after June 18th 2018

26TH MARCH 2020

  • All data is removed from the Business Catalyst infrastructure and sites become unavailable for the public

Read More on BusinessCatalyst.com

item.title: Adobe announces last update to Muse
item.description: On March 26, 2018 Adobe announced the last feature update to Adobe Muse. They will continue to provide support to Creative Cloud customers until May 20, 2019. Read More on the Muse site
item.content:encoded:
On March 26, 2018 Adobe announced the last feature update to Adobe Muse. They will continue to provide support to Creative Cloud customers until May 20, 2019.

Read More on the Muse site
